name: ask_questions
description:
Ask 2-4 carefully chosen questions in parallel. Each question is answered independently with full conversation history. Maximum 4 questions.

Before calling: think about what you truly need to know. Each question should target a distinct unknown â€” avoid overlapping or vague questions. Good questions are specific and actionable.

Examples:
- {{tool:ask_questions}}({"questions": ["What edge cases do the tests check for?", "What data structure best fits this problem?"]})
- {{tool:ask_questions}}({"questions": ["How should setValue propagate changes to dependents?", "What is the expected callback behavior on value change?"]})

questions.description: List of questions to answer in parallel. Each gets full conversation history.
